Package gotcha.controller.servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateChannel
    This Servlet is responsible about creating a new channel
    DeleteChannel
    This Servlet is responsible about deleting a channel
    GetChannelData
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a Channel's stored data.
    GetDirectMessageData
    This Servlet is responsible about getting the user data for a specified direct message.
    GetLastThreadMessage
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a thread last written message.
    GetMessageRepliesNumber
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a specified Message's reply count.
    GetStatus
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a specified User's status.
    GetTenChannelMessages
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a Ten Channel Messages ("packet") from the database.
    GetTenDirectChatMessages
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a Ten Direct Messages ("packet") from the database.
    GetTenThreadMessages
    This Servlet is responsible about getting a Ten Thread Messages (replay) from the database.
    Login
    This Servlet is responsible about logging the user in.
    Logout
    This Servlet is responsible about logging the user out.
    Messages
    This Servlet is responsible about getting messages after success log in.
    Register
    This Servlet is responsible about Registering a new user.
    Search
    This Servlet is responsible about searching channels or users.
    Subscribe
    This Servlet is responsible about Subscribing a user to a Channel.
    Unsubscribe
    This Servlet is responsible about Unsubscribing a user from a Channel.
    UpdateStatus
    This Servlet is responsible about updating a specified User's status.
    Validate
    This Servlet is responsible about validating if a user name/nickname is Available for a new user, or a Channel name for a new Channel.
    Welcome
    This Servlet is responsible about redirecting the user to the log in screen in case he didn't log in yet, otherwise redirect him to the homepage.
Author:
Ahmad
